content: create a stunning four pillars afghan square with this advanced beginner crochet pattern the pattern includes a detailed photo tutorial and written instructions for a 12 inches x 12 inches square the four pillars afghan square is a free 12 x 12 overlay mosaic crochet pattern made with medium weight yarn and a 6 mm j crochet hook this design uses just two colors red heart super saver in white and bitty stripes in sunset beach with a total of 112 yds basic stitches single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch chain make it beginner-friendly and fun to crochet designed for the annual bamcal block-a-month crochet along **unique features-** advanced beginner level project mosaic crochet technique for a unique design includes written and photo tutorial instructions durable and easy-care red heart super saver yarn customize with your favorite color combinations **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn super saver solids aran weight 111-112 yards **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
